channel.title: Npc help!

item.title: Npc help!
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

Hello, i need some help with my make-over mage. i wants him to say “hello, i can give you a make over?”
then you can say “yes” or “no” if you click “yes” its open the showInterface(3559); apset = true; and if you click “no” its says Cya later.

if(NPCID == 599) {
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(599), 4884);
sendFrame126(“hello, i can give you a make over?.”, 4885);
sendFrame126(“Click here to continue.”, 4886);
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;
sendFrame75(599, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
}

Read full topic
